events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible because this product is not what I wanted.
The issue has been categorized under the Refund cluster due to the customer's request for money back related to an incorrect item.
This case has been assigned to agent Sarah L. from the refunds department for further handling and resolution.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the issue with your order. I’m here to help you with the refund process and get this sorted quickly.
Could you please provide the order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify the issue and proceed with your refund?
Here is my order number 123456 and attached is a photo showing the wrong product I got instead of the one I ordered last week.
Thank you for the information. We will process your refund immediately and you should see the amount credited back to your payment method within 5 business days.
Thanks for your quick response and help. I appreciate the fast resolution and look forward to the refund arriving soon.
The refund has been authorized and your case is now resolved. Please let us know if you have any further questions or concerns.
We wanted to follow up and confirm that you received your refund. If everything is satisfactory, we thank you for your patience.
The case has been formally closed. We appreciate your business and are here to assist with any future needs.
